text: Rotherham United have signed Sheffield Wednesday forward Mallik Wilks on a season-long loan deal.
Bournemouth have completed the signing of Brazilian striker Evanilson from Porto in a club record Â£40.2m deal.
Nottingham Forest have signed Paraguay forward Ramon Sosa for Â£9.3m from Talleres.
Stoke City have signed Republic of Ireland midfielder Andrew Moran on a season-long loan from Brighton & Hove Albion.
Tottenham Hotspur have signed winger Wilson Odobert from Burnley for a fee in the region of Â£25m, on a deal until 2029.
AFC Wimbledon have signed centre-back Riley Harbottle from Hibernian on a two-year deal.
Experienced striker Gary Madine has signed for National League club Hartlepool United.
Morecambe have signed Liverpool defender Rhys Williams on loan until January.
Brighton have completed the signing of French forward Georginio Rutter for a club record fee of Â£40m from Leeds.
Brentford have signed defender Sepp van den Berg from Liverpool in a deal worth up to Â£25m.
Notts County have signed Lucas Ness from League One side Charlton Athletic for an undisclosed fee.
Ipswich are set to sign Chelsea striker Armando Broja on a season-long loan in a deal that could become permanent.
Fulham have signed centre-back Joachim Andersen from Crystal Palace for about Â£30m.
Winger Johann Berg Gudmundsson has left Burnley to join Saudi Pro League side Al-Orobah for an undisclosed fee.
Manchester City have completed the signing of former captain Ilkay Gundogan from Barcelona on an initial one-year deal with the option of a further 12 months.
Birmingham City have signed Taylor Gardner-Hickman from Championship club Bristol City.
Sheffield Wednesday defender Bambo Diaby has left the Championship side to join Spanish Segunda Division team Elche for an undisclosed fee.
Ipswich have signed Burnley defender Dara O'Shea for an initial Â£12m plus a potential Â£3m in add-ons.
Plymouth Argyle have signed goalkeeper Daniel Grimshaw from Blackpool for an undisclosed fee.
Ipswich have agreed a deal to sign forward Jack Clarke from Sunderland for an initial fee of Â£15m, plus Â£5m in potential add-ons.
Leicester are close to signing Crystal Palace forward Jordan Ayew for an initial Â£5m.
Portsmouth have signed winger Harvey Blair from Liverpool for a fee BBC Sport understands to be Â£300,000.
Manchester City have agreed a Â£21.2m deal with Saudi Pro League club Al-Hilal to sell defender Joao Cancelo.
Former Real Madrid and Everton playmaker James Rodriguez has joined La Liga club Rayo Vallecano as a free agent.
Brighton have signed midfielder Matt O'Riley from Scottish champions Celtic for a fee of Â£25m.
Ipswich have sealed the Â£8m signing of Luton winger Chiedozie Ogbene.
Arsenal have completed the signing of Spain midfielder Mikel Merino from Real Sociedad for a fee that could reach Â£31.6m.
Bournemouth have signed Chelsea goalkeeper Kepa Arrizabalaga on a season-long loan deal.
Liverpool have agreed a deal to sign Juventus winger Federico Chiesa.
Wrexham have signed striker Mo Faal from Championship club West Bromwich Albion on a contract until 2027.
Blackpool have signed defender Odeluga Offiah on a season-long loan deal from Premier League side Brighton & Hove Albion.
Crystal Palace have signed Wolfsburg centre-back Maxence Lacroix in a deal worth up to Â£18m.
Arsenal striker Eddie Nketiah has joined Crystal Palace for a fee in the region of Â£30m.
League One side Reading have signed Wolves winger Chem Campbell on loan until 5 January.
Manchester United have signed midfielder Manuel Ugarte from Paris St-Germain for a fee that could reach Â£50.5m.
Plymouth Argyle have signed midfielder Rami Al Hajj from Danish side Odense.
Brazilian winger Angelo Gabriel, who never played a competitive match for Chelsea, has join Saudi Pro-League side Al-Nassr from the Blues for Â£19.1m.
Brentford striker Ivan Toney has signed for Saudi Pro League club Al-Ahli.
Former Leeds United captain Liam Cooper has joined Bulgarian side CSKA Sofia.
Leyton Orient have signed midfielder Dominic Ball on a free transfer until the end of the season.
Huddersfield have won the race to sign forward Freddie Ladapo after his release by Ipswich.
Sheffield United goalkeeper Ivo Grbic has signed a season-long loan deal with Turkish side Caykur Rizespor.
Former Manchester United and Chelsea midfielder Juan Mata has joined A-League side Western Sydney Wanderers on a one-year contract.
Former Manchester United forward Anthony Martial has signed for Greek club AEK Athens on a three-year deal.
France midfielder Adrien Rabiot has joined Ligue 1 club Marseille as a free agent.
Luton Town have signed former Netherlands international Erik Pieters on a short-term deal.
Former Manchester City striker Mario Balotelli has joined Serie A club Genoa on a free transfer.
Carlisle United have signed midfielder Will Patching from Irish side Derry City on a two-and-a-half-year contract.
Huddersfield Town have announced the permanent signing of Ruben Roosken from Dutch side Heracles Alemlo for an undisclosed fee.
Ipswich Town have agreed a Â£20m deal to sign Aston Villa winger Jaden Philogene.
